lines.text:
[sings]
Got one leg on my shoulder. Two legs on my shoulder.
You know I could be your daddy
you could be my daddy, man?
yeah, I used to fuck buffalo.
[as a Jamaican dope dealer in TV movie]

[singing]
Dope! Do-o-o-o-pe! How come nobody don't want to buy no dope? Dope, I say dope I say do-o-o-o-o-pe. Who wants to buy dope?
We should have a dope-a-thon. You know try to raise money for like all the people that lost there crops.
Now you know what I want you to do, don't you? And it ain't prayin', cop.

[as Blind Melon Chitlin]
I wanna sing a little tune I wrote one day while I was beatin' my old lady, it's called "GOING DOWNTOWN GONNA SEE MY GIRL"
